title: New React 19 Features Announced
description: The React team has unveiled the latest features coming in version 19, including the new Compiler and enhanced Server Actions.
author: Tech Team
content:
The React team has officially unveiled the features for React 19, marking a significant shift in how we build frontend applications. The focus this time is on performance, developer experience, and seamless server-side integration.

The React Compiler

Perhaps the most anticipated feature is the new automatic React Compiler. No more manual memoization using useMemo or useCallback. The compiler automatically optimizes your code, ensuring that components only re-render when absolutely necessary.

Server Actions

React 19 doubles down on Server Actions, allowing developers to call server-side functions directly from client components. This streamlines data mutation and reduces the need for separate API endpoints for simple tasks.

These updates are currently available in the Canary channel and will be rolling out to the stable release soon.

comments.author: Frontend Fan
comments.text: I've been waiting for the compiler! No more useMemo everywhere?

comments.author: Dev Lead
comments.text: Server Actions are going to simplify our codebase significantly.

title: VTS Hackathon Registration Open
description: Join us for the annual VTS Code-a-thon! Register now to compete for prizes and showcase your skills.
author: Events Team
content:
We are thrilled to announce that registration for the Annual VTS Code-a-thon is now open! This is your chance to collaborate with fellow developers, solve real-world problems, and win amazing prizes.

Event Details

  • Date: December 15-17, 2025
  • Mode: Hybrid (Online & Offline Campus)
  • Team Size: 2-4 Members

Prizes

The winning team will receive a grand cash prize of $5,000, along with internship opportunities at top tech firms. There are also category prizes for 'Best UI/UX', 'Most Innovative Solution', and 'Best Use of AI'.

Slots are filling up fast! Head over to the events page to register your team today.

title: Platform Maintenance Update
description: We will be performing scheduled maintenance on the learning portal this Sunday from 2 AM to 4 AM.
author: Support
content:
To ensure the best possible experience for our learners, we will be performing scheduled maintenance on the VTS Learning Portal.

Maintenance Schedule

During this window, the platform will be temporarily unavailable. This maintenance includes:
